metadata.name: melancholic man
metadata.description:
The underground culture remains a mystery with a different meaning for everyone. I wanted to explain what it means for me in this piece.

A melancholic man takes shelter in an alley in the rain and smokes a cigarette. the underworld has potential values based on observation and feelings. melancholy has heavy feelings. all that's left is a man in a jacket and a hat, smoking a cigarette...
